metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3248 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: openhpi/Makefile.am in OpenHPI before 3.6.0 uses world-writable permissions for /var/lib/openhpi directory, which allows local users, when quotas are not properly setup, to fill the filesystem hosting /var/lib and cause a denial of service (disk consumption).

notes.Note: sbeattie> directory is world-readable but not world-writable in debian/ubuntu.

criterions.comment: openhpi package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
